name: Sinfonia sacra
desc: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?

value.text: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 55% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Ricetta: piatto di salumi
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Cold Cut Platter.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Pancetta
value.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

value.name: Salsiccia
value.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Piatto di salumi
value.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.

value.name: Fischl
value.desc: Una ragazza misteriosa che si fa chiamare Prinzessin der Verurteilung e che viaggia in compagnia di un corvo di nome Oz.
